text: Kɨ mɨgeir mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam, a gumazir onganimɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨamɨn mɨn ghu. Ezɨ ia uari na gamizɨ, kɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam gami. Ia nan arazir aghuiba dar, gun mɨkemeghtɨ, deragham. Ia kamaghɨn amizir puvatɨ, kɨ uabɨ mɨgei. Guizbangɨra kɨ pura bizim, egha kɨ ian “Aposelɨn Ekiaba” bar men apengan itir puvatɨ.
